author: davidvc
msg: DERBY-1004: Client should not require user to rollback the active transaction before call to PooledConnection.getConnection()

author: rhillegas
msg: DERBY-1379: Committed Olav's autoload.diff. This fixes the problem which caused all of the nist tests to fail when derbyall was run against jar files under jdk1.6 with the db2jcc jar in the classpath.

msg: DataGraph Java serialization and related cleanup

author: tomdz
msg: Made auto-increment column required in order to avoid problems with databases that have a dedicated IDENTITY constraint which usually set this anyway
